name: Alice
description: A kind-hearted mage who wields the power of water to heal her allies.

name: Bob
description: A daring warrior who uses his mastery of fire to burn down his enemies.

name: Charlie
description: A swift archer who harnesses the power of wind to strike from a distance.

name: David
description: A sturdy defender who uses his connection to the earth to protect his allies.

name: Eve
description: A mysterious priestess who channels the power of light to smite her foes.
